data.title: Estimating the prevalence of hepatitis delta virus infection among adults in the United States: A meta
meta_keywords: Emigrants and Immigrants / statistics & numerical data
data.meta_description: Including both FB and U.S.-born persons, we estimated that 1.971 M and 75 005 persons were living with CHB and HDV, respectively, in the U.S. in 2022.
